title: Bugsplat Fix
body:
If you're like me and your game gets through champ select but as soon as you get to load into the game bugsplat pops up then this should fix that. So if you've tried everything else on riots support page do this. What I did was I restored a previous version of windows which you can easily look up how to do online. This worked for me I hope it works for you. 
{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

replies.body:
For Mac, there's a [bugsplat & crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#section-mac) guide that addresses the most common solutions. Macs have a few different hardware controllers that can be reset to resolve a lot of issues.

Check it out and let me know if it helped. ^.^
